plum.type module¶

class plum.type.VarArgs(type=<class 'object'>)[source]¶

Bases: plum.type.AbstractType

Plum type that represents a variable number of the same Plum type.

Parameters

type (type or ptype, optional) – Type or Plum type of the variable number of types. Defaults to object.

expand(num)[source]¶

Expand the varargs to a tuple of types.

Parameters

num (int) – Length of the tuple.

Returns

Expansion.

Return type

tuple

parametric¶

Boolean that indicates whether this is or contains a parametric type.

class plum.type.Union(*types, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: plum.type.ComparableType

A union of Plum types.

Parameters

  • *types (type or ptype) – Types or Plum types to encapsulate.

  • alias (str, optional) – Give the union a name.

class plum.type.Self[source]¶

Bases: plum.resolvable.Reference, plum.type.PromisedType

Reference Plum type.

Note

Both resolvable.Reference and type.PromisedType implement resolve(). We need that from resolvable.Reference, so we inherit from resolvable.Reference first.
